ANY - Static variable in interface de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.Fields.Filter
Defines a filter accepting all fields (including static fields).

C

compact(Class<?>) - Static method in interface de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.Fields.Naming

conditional(Class<?>) - Static method in interface de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.Fields.Naming

distance(Class<?>, Class<?>) - Static method in class de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.Classes
Determines the distance of a given class <subject> from one of its superclasses or interfaces <superClass>, where the distance of a class to itself is always 0.

F

Fields - Class in de.team33.libs.reflect.v4
Utility for dealing with fields.
Fields() - Constructor for class de.team33.libs.reflect.v4.Fields
 
Fields.Filter - Interface in de.team33.libs.reflect.v4
Provides some predefined filters for Fields.
Fields.Mapping - Interface in de.team33.libs.reflect.v4
In essence, a Fields.Mapping is a Function to get a Map whose values represent a subset of all Fields declared by a given Class or one of its superclasses.
Fields.Naming - Interface in de.team33.libs.reflect.v4
Defines some typical Functions that serve to find a name for a Field.
Fields.Streaming - Interface in de.team33.libs.reflect.v4
Defines some typical Functions that serve to stream Fields of a given Class.

Defines a filter accepting all final fields.
